title: Podkrepi.bg - a transparent online donation platform
metaDescription: Podkrepi.bg is a transparent online donation platform created by a team of volunteers from the Podkrepi BG organization.

activity-section.heading: What do we do?
activity-section.content: Podkrepi.bg is an association of professionals united by the idea of creating a free and completely transparent online donation platform, which can be used freely by citizens and organizations.

team-section.heading: Who is behind Podkrepi.bg?
team-section.content: Podkrepi.bg is a community of specialists in the field of programming, law, marketing, design, medicine, finance, social entrepreneurship and others. We are united by the goal of creating a sustainable and transparent donation platform that supports causes and people in need, while promoting and restoring trust in donations in Bulgaria.

mission-vision-goals-section.mission-text: To create a completely transparent online donation platform, supported by donations and membership fees to our association, and not % commission from the companies.
mission-vision-goals-section.vision-text: To improve the donation culture in Bulgaria drastically by increasing transparency and trust in donation campaigns and platforms.
mission-vision-goals-section.goals-text-open-source: - To create an open-source platform which reduces the chances of misuse.

how-we-work.heading: How does Pordkprepi.bg work?
how-we-work.text: We have built a process of creating campaigns that ensures maximum security for donor funds and at the same time - attention and support to the needs of beneficiaries.

platform-statistics.heading: What we achieved so far?
platform-statistics.text: We thoroughly examine each campaign before it becomes active on our platform, paying out every last lev of the funds collected without withholding a penny for our efforts. We believed that, by doing so, we earn your trust and make donations in Bulgaria a transperant initiative.
